text: Daniele Munari (born 16 June 1983) is an Italian skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:People from Asiago
title: Daniele Munari
